name: Avatier
overview: Avatier Corporation provides identity and access management software. Its self-service password reset and employee provisioning and de-provisioning solutions enable enterprises to securely manage employee access to corporate resources, password resets, and account unlocks. It provides user provisioning and password management software solutions for midrange and large enterprises. The companyâ€™s products include Account Creator for automated user provisioning; Password Bouncer, advanced password policy enforcement with wordlist filtering; Account Terminator for automated user deprovisioning; and Identity Enforcer, a self-service user provisioning and policy enforcement. It also offers Password Station, a cross platform self-service password reset and synchronization; and Trusted Enterprise Manager that provides task automation, role-based delegation, real-time auditing, policy-based management, and administration-enabled reporting for distributed Microsoft Windows environments. The companyâ€™s solutions are designed to help financial services, federal government, and managed service providers. It serves customers operating in the sectors of consumer goods, education, financial, government, manufacturing, media, medical, services, technology, telecom, transportation, and utilities in the United States, Canada, Europe, Latin America, and Asia. The company distributes its products directly and through global partnerships. Avatier Corporation was formerly known as Master Design & Development, Inc. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in San Ramon, California.
